text:
Jimmy Kimmel

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Jimmy Kimmel (born November 13, 1967) is an American television talk-show host and comedian. He began his television career as the co-host of the game show Win Ben Stein's Money in 1997, and served as the co-host and co-creator (with Adam Carolla) of The Man Show from 1999 until 2003. In January 2003, Kimmel made the leap to his own five-night-a-week talk show on a broadcast network: Jimmy Kimmel Live on ABC, which airs after Nightline.

Kimmel was born in Brooklyn, New York, but grew up primarily in Las Vegas, Nevada.
title: Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
